title: ICE: "LLVM ERROR: Broken module found" when compiling rand with parallel codegen

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Check out the master branch of https://github.com/rust-lang/rand
2. Append `[profile.dev] codegen-units = 2` to `Cargo.toml`.
3. Run `cargo build -v`.

I get an error 100% of the time using the latest Rust nightly on a 4-core 64-bit Linux machine:

```
   Compiling rand v0.3.8 (file:///home/mbrubeck/src/rand)
     Running `rustc src/lib.rs --crate-name rand --crate-type lib -C codegen-units=2 -g --out-dir /home/mbrubeck/src/rand/target/debug --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/home/mbrubeck/src/rand/target/debug -L dependency=/home/mbrubeck/src/rand/target/debug/deps --extern libc=/home/mbrubeck/src/rand/target/debug/deps/liblibc-ef5cbad4ef5c7a1e.rlib`
       Fresh libc v0.1.8
       Fresh log v0.3.1
Global is external, but doesn't have external or weak linkage!
i64 (i64, i64)* @"_ZN4iter30Map$LT$I$C$$u20$F$GT$.Iterator4next12closure.7629E"
invalid linkage type for function declaration
i64 (i64, i64)* @"_ZN4iter30Map$LT$I$C$$u20$F$GT$.Iterator4next12closure.7629E"
Global is external, but doesn't have external or weak linkage!
void (%"2.core::option::Option<(&'static mut core::num::Wrapping<u32>, &'static u32)>"*, i64, %"2.core::num::Wrapping<u32>"*)* @"_ZN4iter30Zip$LT$A$C$$u20$B$GT$.Iterator4next12closure.7997E"
invalid linkage type for function declaration
void (%"2.core::option::Option<(&'static mut core::num::Wrapping<u32>, &'static u32)>"*, i64, %"2.core::num::Wrapping<u32>"*)* @"_ZN4iter30Zip$LT$A$C$$u20$B$GT$.Iterator4next12closure.7997E"
Global is external, but doesn't have external or weak linkage!
void (%"2.core::option::Option<(&'static mut core::num::Wrapping<u32>, &'static u32)>"*, i64, i32*)* @"_ZN4iter30Zip$LT$A$C$$u20$B$GT$.Iterator4next12closure.8003E"
invalid linkage type for function declaration
void (%"2.core::option::Option<(&'static mut core::num::Wrapping<u32>, &'static u32)>"*, i64, i32*)* @"_ZN4iter30Zip$LT$A$C$$u20$B$GT$.Iterator4next12closure.8003E"
LLVM ERROR: Broken module found, compilation aborted!
Could not compile `rand`.

Caused by:
  Process didn't exit successfully: `rustc src/lib.rs --crate-name rand --crate-type lib -C codegen-units=2 -g --out-dir /home/mbrubeck/src/rand/target/debug --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/home/mbrubeck/src/rand/target/debug -L dependency=/home/mbrubeck/src/rand/target/debug/deps --extern libc=/home/mbrubeck/src/rand/target/debug/deps/liblibc-ef5cbad4ef5c7a1e.rlib` (exit code: 1)

$ rustc -Vv
rustc 1.2.0-nightly (2228ce10c 2015-06-09)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 2228ce10c6d83c17b6346396aa7c7ef9082f1c04
commit-date: 2015-06-09
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.2.0-nightly
```

cc @nrc
